tool_description: Calculates delivery timelines, estimates, and compares actual vs expected delivery times for return shipments.

shipment_date.description: Date when the return shipment was initiated

service_type.description: Shipping service type (ground, express, overnight, standard)

exclude_weekends.description: Whether to exclude weekends from business day calculations

error_messages: Invalid date format: shipment_date and actual_delivery_date must be in ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid service type: Use one of [ground, express, overnight, standard].
Invalid ZIP codes: origin_zip and destination_zip must be valid postal codes.
Unsupported carrier: Use one of [UPS, FedEx, USPS, DHL].
Timeline calculation failed: Unable to calculate delivery timeline due to invalid input parameters.
usage: Provide shipment_date, service_type, origin_zip, destination_zip, and carrier, optionally specify actual_delivery_date and exclude_weekends.

business_days_estimate.description: Estimated delivery time in business days

delivery_variance_days.description: Difference between estimated and actual delivery (negative = early, positive = late)

on_time_status.description: Delivery performance status (early, on_time, late, pending)
